question: Identify the symptoms of pneumonia.
choices: Constipation, Abdominal pain, cramps, blood clots
Difficulty in breathing, fever, chills, cough, headache
High fever, weakness, stomach pain, loss of appetite
Nasal congestion and discharge, cough, sore throat, headache
explanation: Pneumonia symptoms include fever, chills, cough, and headache. In severe cases, the lips and finger nails may turn gray to bluish. Difficulty in breathing is common due to fluid-filled alveoli.
